snippet: The passengers bound for China on Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370 represented a vivid cross-section of a nation well into an economic transformation: artists and corporate salespeople, foreign businesspeople and technology firm employees.
abstract: Malaysia Airlines flight that disappeared en route from Kuala Lumpur to Beijing carried vivid cross-section of Chinese citizens, representing nation in its fourth decade of a dizzying economic transformation.

byline.contributor: Amy Qin and Andrew Jacobs contributed reporting from Beijing, and Michelle Innis from Sydney, Australia. Mia Li, Patrick Zuo and Kun Kun contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The passengers bound for China on Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370 represented a vivid cross-section of a nation well into an economic transformation: artists and corporate salespeople, foreign businesspeople and technology firm employees.

headline.main: In the Details of Passengers’ Lives, Signs of Hope and Prosperity
headline.print_headline: In the Details of Passengers’ Lives, Signs of Hope and Prosperity
